name: justin.tv - Cleaned Broadcaster View
description:
Removes all clutter on broadcast view and fixes some design bugs.

Easy adjustable chat column width for fitting your browsers window width (see CSS code for info and howto).

2010-02-25: Now does not apply anything on regular website (profiles, channels, etc.) but only on broadcaster view (justin.tv/br/USERNAME).

PLEASE REMEMBER: After updating you need to set the width (as described above) again.
